price: (2) [All] praise is [due] to Allāh, Lord[4] of the worlds -
footnotes: [4]- When referring to Allāh (subḥānahu wa taʿālā) , the Arabic term "rabb" (translated as "Lord") includes all of the following meanings: "owner, master, ruler, controller, sustainer, provider, guardian and caretaker."
